data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Seongnam.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Seongnam are pushing forward but Park Tae-jun's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Tomislav Kis of Seongnam gets in a strike, but is off target.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick Seongnam.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Seongnam at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seongnam's half?
In the minute 16, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
In the minute 19, Throw-in Seongnam.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Seongnam.
In the minute 22, Sangju Sangmu's Jung Won-jin misses with an attempt on goal.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lee Tae-heui for Seongnam who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Lee Tae-heui for Seongnam is back on the field again.
Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Seongnam at Sangju Civic Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sangju Sangmu are coming forward and Jung Won-jin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Seongnam.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Tomislav Kis of Seongnam gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Sangju Sangmu in Sangju.
In the minute 40, Sangju Sangmu's Lee Dong-su misses with an attempt on goal.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Sangju Sangmu are pushing forward but Kim Bo-seob's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 41, Seongnam have a goal kick.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 43, Seongnam are coming forward and Yeon Je-un gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Bae Jae-uh (Sangju Sangmu) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Tomislav Kis's header is off-target for Seongnam.
In the minute 51, Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu drives forward and Ahn Tae-hyeon gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 56, Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Sangju Sangmu needs to be cautious. Seongnam have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Yang Dong-hyeon is on a sub for Tomislav Kis for Seongnam.
Sangju Sangmu make their first substitution with Seon-min Moon replacing Song Seung-min.
Seongnam are pushing forward but Yeon Je-un's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.

Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
In the minute 68, Sangju Sangmu takes a corner from the left.
Seongnam pushes forward through Na Sangho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Bae Jae-uh with Ju-Sung Woo.
Free kick Seongnam.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
In the minute 76, Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Moon Chang-jin is replacing Jung Won-jin for the home team.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Kim Seon-uh is booked for the home team.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
In the minute 86, Seon-min Moon of Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.

Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu takes a corner from the right.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Seongnam needs to be cautious. Sangju Sangmu have an attacking throw-in.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Seongnam make their second substitution with Lee Jae-won replacing Park Tae-jun.
